sourcesContent: import{translate as e,DefaultTexts as t}from"../../i18n/translations.js";var n={amazon:"Amazon",apple:"Apple",facebook:"Facebook",google:"Google"},r={getBackToSignInText:function(){return e(t.BACK_SIGN_IN)},getChangePasswordText:function(){return e(t.CHANGE_PASSWORD)},getChangingText:function(){return e(t.CHANGING_PASSWORD)},getConfirmText:function(){return e(t.CONFIRM)},getConfirmingText:function(){return e(t.CONFIRMING)},getCopyText:function(){return e(t.UPPERCASE_COPY)},getHidePasswordText:function(){return e(t.HIDE_PASSWORD)},getLoadingText:function(){return e(t.LOADING)},getResendCodeText:function(){return e(t.RESEND_CODE)},getSendCodeText:function(){return e(t.SEND_CODE)},getSendingText:function(){return e(t.SENDING)},getShowPasswordText:function(){return e(t.SHOW_PASSWORD)},getSubmitText:function(){return e(t.SUBMIT)},getSubmittingText:function(){return e(t.SUBMITTING)},getSignInTabText:function(){return e(t.SIGN_IN_TAB)},getSignUpTabText:function(){return e(t.CREATE_ACCOUNT)},getForgotPasswordText:function(n){return e(n?t.FORGOT_PASSWORD:t.FORGOT_YOUR_PASSWORD)},getSigningInText:function(){return e(t.SIGNING_IN_BUTTON)},getSignInText:function(){return e(t.SIGN_IN_BUTTON)},getCreatingAccountText:function(){return e(t.CREATING_ACCOUNT)},getCreateAccountText:function(){return e(t.CREATE_ACCOUNT)},getDeliveryMessageText:function(t){var n=null!=t?t:{},r=n.DeliveryMedium,o=n.Destination,i="EMAIL"===r;if(!i&&!("SMS"===r))return e("Your code is on the way. To log in, enter the code we sent you. It may take a minute to arrive.");var u=e("Your code is on the way. To log in, enter the code we ".concat(i?"emailed":"texted"," to")),c=e("It may take a minute to arrive.");return"".concat(u," ").concat(o,". ").concat(c)},getDeliveryMethodText:function(t){var n=(null!=t?t:{}).DeliveryMedium,r="EMAIL"===n;return e(r||"SMS"!==n?"We ".concat(r?"Emailed":"Texted"," You"):"We Sent A Code")},getChallengeText:function(n){switch(n){case"SMS_MFA":return e(t.CONFIRM_SMS);case"SOFTWARE_TOKEN_MFA":return e(t.CONFIRM_TOTP);default:throw new Error("".concat(e("Unexpected challengeName encountered in ConfirmSignIn:")," ").concat(n))}},getResetYourPasswordText:function(){return e(t.RESET_PASSWORD)},getSetupTOTPText:function(){return e(t.SETUP_TOTP)},getSetupTOTPInstructionsText:function(){return e("Copy and paste the secret key below into an authenticator app and then enter the code in the text field below.")},getCopiedText:function(){return e("COPIED")},getSignInWithFederationText:function(t,r){return e("Sign ".concat("signIn"===t?"In":"Up"," with ").concat(n[r]))},getSkipText:function(){return e(t.SKIP)},getVerifyText:function(){return e(t.VERIFY)},getVerifyContactText:function(){return e(t.VERIFY_CONTACT)},getAccountRecoveryInfoText:function(){return e(t.VERIFY_HEADING)}};export{r as authenticatorTextUtil};
